name: Polar Phase
description:
Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit  gamejam 2018!

Polar Phase is an arena shooter without guns! Your only option of fighting back is to reflect enemy bullets! You also have two defensive abilities. Switching polarity can help you deal with less projectiles. Phase Shifting slows down time for easier dodging, but watch your energy bar!

Mac & Linux versions haven't been tested personally!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Reflect bullets (Can be held for bigger reflection area!)

Right Mouse Button - Switch Polarity

Space - Phase Shift (Slows down time for easier dodging)

Thank you for playing!

Barna Lángi a.k.a. Unknown Origin
